Text: Ft Pierce EPC Term Sheetis a VERY PRELIMINARY draft of the EPC Term Sheet for review and comment It has a lot of holes and needs to be read in that light I will give it more time and attention after input from the project team If the Term Sheet is intended to go to third party EPC contractors I would strongly suggest that we do no use it We would be much better off using the draft of the Turbo Park EPC Contract as modified for Fountain Valley Larry
